tool_description: Assembles validated extracted data into a complete, structured candidate profile with standardized formatting and additional computed fields.

contact_info.description: Validated JSON string of contact information

education_info.description: Validated JSON string of education information

experience_info.description: Validated JSON string of work experience

skills_info.description: Validated JSON string of skills and competencies

quality_scores.description: JSON string of resume quality assessment scores

profile_template.description: Profile template to use (standard, detailed, minimal)

error_messages: Invalid JSON input: One or more input parameters contain malformed JSON strings.
Missing required data: All four core data parameters must contain valid information.
Invalid template: profile_template must be one of [standard, detailed, minimal].
Profile assembly failed: Unable to create coherent profile from provided data fragments.
usage: Provide all validated data components as JSON strings. Choose appropriate profile_template based on intended use case and configure summary generation and metadata inclusion as needed.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for the candidate profile

candidate_summary.description: Generated professional summary of the candidate

structured_profile.description: Complete candidate profile as formatted JSON string

data_sources.description: Sources of data used in profile construction
